post.author: Admin
post.title: Let's Celebrate Saturday!
post.description: Our band program has had a great year! We had a fantastic marching band season and all four concert
post.content:
Our band program has had a great year! We had a fantastic marching band season and all four concert bands had wonderful performances at States last weekend. So let's celebrate this Saturday night at the Raffle Fundraiser at the 3 Spot from 6pm - 9pm! You can purchase tickets at the door. Don’t miss a night of fun!

Basket Raffle Preview Nights: For those of you who are not able to attend the basket raffle on Saturday but would like to participate in the raffle, NOW is your opportunity. We are hosting a Preview night Thursday and Friday this week from 5-8 at Anne Christensen’s home (12740 Pinebrook Dr; 330-304-2499). You will be able to purchase raffle tickets for the baskets so bring cash with you.

Here are just some baskets you will see.

Music & Wine Under the Stars:

  • Bottle of wine
  • Blossom music tickets

Stay in Style:

  • Cut & style by Antoine’s Le Jour Spa & Salon
  • Hair Products

We are The Champions:

  • Cavs rookie, Kay Fedler signed hat
  • Cav’s shirt, bag, notepad, pen, pencil, bracelet & ball

Play Golf:

  • 2 18 holes of Golf
  • Golf simulator
  • Driving range
  • Miniature golf

Date Night:

  • Premier Design music themed bracelet & a candle
  • $50 for dinner at Trivs

Sporting your Team Pride:

  • 4 tickets to the Cleveland Gladiators
  • 2 tickets to the Rubber Ducks
  • 2 tickets to the Monsters
  • Cleveland Browns hat and bag

Help Wanted: We are coming down to the last days before the basket raffle and we still need some help. Shifts are only one hour so you will still be able to enjoy your evening. Sign up here.
